tool_description: An API that checks if an email address exists on the server by evaluating various parameters such as MX records, SMTP deliverability, and disposable email checks.

api_list.name: Help Page
api_list.description: Provides assistance and guidance to users on how to use the API.

api_list.name: Homepage | About the API
api_list.description: Displays information about the API, including developer details, documentation, and server status.

api_list.name: Verify the Existence of Email
api_list.description: Endpoint that takes an email address and returns a JSON response indicating whether the email exists on the server.

api_list.name: Check for Disposable emails
api_list.description: Checks if the provided email address is disposable or temporary.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The email address to check for disposability.

api_list.name: Get the MX Records
api_list.description: Retrieves the MX records associated with the provided email address.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The email address for which to retrieve MX records.
